text: Stanko Lorger (14 February 1931 - 25 April 2014) was a Slovenian hurdler. He competed for Yugoslavia at the 1952, 1956, and 1960 Summer Olympics. He was born in Benedikt, Municipality of Benedikt. Lorger died on 25 April 2014 at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Stanko Lorger at Sports- Reference Category:1931 births Category:2014 deaths Category:1952 Summer Olympics Category:1956 Summer Olympics Category:Competitors at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Hurdlers Category:Olympians for Slovenia Category:Olympians for Yugoslavia Category:Yugoslavian athletes
title: Stanko Lorger
